Name: 故郷をさがす三姉妹/ The Three Sisters looking for their back home.
About the game: This is an experimentation of recreating the dream, much more than a game. You can stroll in the world which the creator has actually dreamed. Your dream can proceed with guidance written on the button for the destination. Features: The world used the original handcrafted figures Emulator of the dream Single-player Short playtime First-person point of view Control: arrow keys - moveSHIFT W A S D -move a viewpoint
